alert.note: Alert for Union (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 30 at 11:37AM EST until February 06 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky...Illinois...Indiana... Ohio River at Newburgh Dam, Mount Vernon, J.T. Myers Dam and Shawneetown. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pah. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING TO TUESDAY, FEBRUARY 06... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning to Tuesday, February 06. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 35.5 feet. - Bankfull stage is 37.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 38.6 feet early Saturday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday, February 06. - Flood stage is 37.0 feet. &&
